articles.title: ‘He’s one of the best in the world, should be in Pakistan's WT20 squad’: Wasim Akram on Amir’s return - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former captain Wasim Akram feels that Mohammad Amir should be in Pakistan’s World T20 squad stating that the latter is an experienced cricketer and can guide the younger players in the team.
articles.content:
Former Pakistan captain and pace legend Wasim Akram feels that Mohammad Amir should be included in the national squad for the upcoming T20I World Cup, slated to be held in India later this year.
